mapper.update: update course set name = #{name}, content = #{content},score=#{score},teacher_id=#{teacher_id},num=#{num},time=#{time},location=#{location},college_id=#{college_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select course.*,teacher.name ad teacherName,college.name as collegeName from course left join teacher_info on teacher_info.id = course.teacherId left join college on college.id = course.collegeId
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by course.id desc
